data.title: The Last Starship from Earth by Boyd, First Edition
data.meta_description: The Last Starship from Earth by John Boyd and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Mass Market Paperback. Condition: Very Good. ----------2 paperbacks by Boyd, both first Pan printings. Starship, his first book, has cover creases, edgewear, store stamp on the page block bottom edge, and is VG. Rakehells has a reading crease, edgewear, small waterstain to the bottom right corner, and is VG to VG+.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. 1st Edition. First Edition; A Very Good book in a Very Good dust jacket. A handsome copy of this Science Fiction novel by one of the great SciFi authors of the 20th century. This copy is in very good condition with some minor shelf wear to the spine ends and edges, mild sunning to the board edges, and a previous owner's stamp to the front free end paper. Housed in a very good dust jacket that is clean and bright but does show some mild rubbing and chipping to the spine ends, edges, and corners, and a very light fading to the spine. Overall, a nice copy that presents well; not remaindered, not price clipped, not ex-library. In archival protection.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine Book. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine Dustjacket. First Edition. First Printing. This Copy With Bookmark From Author's Laguna Beach Bookstore Laid In. A Fine Copy In A Dustjacket With A One Inch Closed Tear At Top Of Front Spine Edge, Formerly Reinforced With Drafting Tape Which Has Been Removed. Slight Bumping To Top And Bottom Of Spine, With Trace Of Wear At A Few Tiny Points, Although Paper As A Whole Shows No Points Of Total Loss. 1/8" Closed Tear At Top Of Front Panel. Inside Of Dustjacket Shows Browning Along Top Edge For A Depth Of About 1/64" And Is Not Visible From The Outside Of The Jacket.
